alert.note: Alert for Schuyler; Steuben; Yates (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 26 at 1:47PM EDT until June 26 at 2:30PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Schuyler County in central New York... South central Yates County in central New York... Northeastern Steuben County in central New York... * Until 230 PM EDT. * At 147 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Savona, or 11 miles northwest of Corning, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Campbell, Tyrone, Thurston, Wayne, Bradford, Savona, Burdett, Meads Creek, Reading Center and Monterey. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
